main.name: Jos√© Carmona
main.description: I'm creating awesome and effective visual identities for companies of all sizes around the globe. I have about 3 years of experience in IT this industry.    I have expertise in the following latest technologies. HTML, CSS, Javascript, Es6, React, Redux, ReactNative, MaterialUI, Bootstrap, Nodejs, Express, Progressive Web Apps, unity3D, C, C++, Java. You'll get all the expected stuff like a great professional service with Extremely fast delivery, Full source code, 24/7 Availability and Quality. Feel free to contact me
main.bio: Bachelor of Computer Science, with solid experience in software development, applying good practices so that a project can be carried out effectively and efficiently. Responsible, organized and self-taught, as well as easy adaptation to changes and excellent teamworkIn order to maintain a control of the code and the elaborated projects, one always works under a control of versions. Being able to be GIT or SVN. And for greater support each of the projects are hosted on a server in the cloud (internet). Among the storage options are: github, bitbucket, gitlab, riouxsvn, among others.It should be noted that the type of technology used is flexible, depending on the requirements of the project.Documentation of the developed project is also provided, as long as it is specified that its elaboration is desired.On the other hand, it is always in constant updating with the most effective and efficient tendencies of systems development, in addition to the self-taught learning of emerging technologies or efficient technologies of great recognition. For example, if a customer wants to use certain types of technological tools that are not currently within the mentioned repertoire, the proviso is made to adapt to it.I have special attention in scientific research developments, video games and artificial intelligence.The decision has been taken to enter into projects through this medium because there are no geographical barriers in the development of projects. In addition, this contributes to professional enrichment, taking into account the multi-cultural aspects that each client represents.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
